mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, SUM(b.room_stock) AS 'sum', MIN(b.room_price) AS 'price' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS b ON a.`acc_id` = b.`acc_id` AND ST_Distance_Sphere(`acc_xy`, ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', #{lng}, ' ', #{lat}, ')'))) <= 5000 GROUP BY a.`acc_id`
ORDER BY a.`acc_review` DESC
ORDER BY a.`acc_rate` DESC
ORDER BY `price` ASC
ORDER BY ST_Distance_Sphere(a.`acc_xy`, ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', #{lng}, ' ', #{lat}, ')'))) asc
LIMIT #{offset}, 10;
